com.vuzix.speech
Class Constants

java.lang.Object
  com.vuzix.speech.Constants

public class Constants
extends java.lang.Object

The class containing all the constants for the Vuzix speech recognizer.

Field Summary

          Broadcast Action: Add the grammar specified by EXTRA_GRAMMAR and give it the name specified by EXTRA_GRAMMAR_NAME.

          Broadcast Action: Remove the grammar with the name specified by EXTRA_GRAMMAR_NAME.

          Broadcast Action: Switches the currently loaded acoustic model to the one specified by EXTRA_MODEL.

          Broadcast Action: Tells the speech recognizer to switch acoustic models to the one specified by EXTRA_WORDLIST.
static java.lang.String ACTION_STOP_RECOGNIZER
          Broadcast Action: Tell the speech recognizer to stop entirely and close.
static java.lang.String ACTION_STOP_RECOGNIZING
          Broadcast Action: Tell the speech recognizer to stop listening until it gets told to start again with SpeechRecognizer.startListening(android.content.Intent).
static java.lang.String EXTRA_GRAMMAR
          Used as an int, String, or byte array extra field in ACTION_ADD_GRAMMAR intents to specify the grammar to be added.
static java.lang.String EXTRA_GRAMMAR_NAME
          Used as a String extra field in ACTION_ADD_GRAMMAR and ACTION_REMOVE_GRAMMAR intents to specify the name of the grammar to be added or removed.

          Used as an int extra field in ACTION_SET_MODEL intents to specify the acoustic model.

          Used as a space-delimited String extra field in ACTION_SET_WORDLIST intents to specify the wordlist against which to compare the recognition results.

Field Detail

ACTION_SET_MODEL

public static final java.lang.String ACTION_SET_MODEL
Broadcast Action: Switches the currently loaded acoustic model to the one specified by EXTRA_MODEL.

See Also:
Constant Field Values

EXTRA_MODEL

public static final java.lang.String EXTRA_MODEL
Used as an int extra field in ACTION_SET_MODEL intents to specify the acoustic model.

See Also:
Constant Field Values

ACTION_STOP_RECOGNIZING

public static final java.lang.String ACTION_STOP_RECOGNIZING
Broadcast Action: Tell the speech recognizer to stop listening until it gets told to start again with SpeechRecognizer.startListening(android.content.Intent).

See Also:
Constant Field Values

ACTION_STOP_RECOGNIZER

public static final java.lang.String ACTION_STOP_RECOGNIZER
Broadcast Action: Tell the speech recognizer to stop entirely and close. After receiving this intent, the recognizer will need to be completely restarted.

See Also:
Constant Field Values

ACTION_ADD_GRAMMAR

public static final java.lang.String ACTION_ADD_GRAMMAR
Broadcast Action: Add the grammar specified by EXTRA_GRAMMAR and give it the name specified by EXTRA_GRAMMAR_NAME.

See Also:
Constant Field Values

ACTION_REMOVE_GRAMMAR

public static final java.lang.String ACTION_REMOVE_GRAMMAR
Broadcast Action: Remove the grammar with the name specified by EXTRA_GRAMMAR_NAME.

See Also:
Constant Field Values

EXTRA_GRAMMAR

public static final java.lang.String EXTRA_GRAMMAR
Used as an int, String, or byte array extra field in ACTION_ADD_GRAMMAR intents to specify the grammar to be added.

See Also:
Constant Field Values

EXTRA_GRAMMAR_NAME

public static final java.lang.String EXTRA_GRAMMAR_NAME
Used as a String extra field in ACTION_ADD_GRAMMAR and ACTION_REMOVE_GRAMMAR intents to specify the name of the grammar to be added or removed.

See Also:
Constant Field Values

ACTION_SET_WORDLIST

public static final java.lang.String ACTION_SET_WORDLIST
Broadcast Action: Tells the speech recognizer to switch acoustic models to the one specified by EXTRA_WORDLIST.

See Also:
Constant Field Values

EXTRA_WORDLIST

public static final java.lang.String EXTRA_WORDLIST
Used as a space-delimited String extra field in ACTION_SET_WORDLIST intents to specify the wordlist against which to compare the recognition results. If a result is not contained in this list it will not be returned.

See Also:
Constant Field Values
